TEXT.TITLE: TEXACO <TX> FORMS A NEW EXPLORATION DEPARTMENT
TEXT.BODY: Texaco Inc said it has formed a new Frontier Exploration Department to initiate and evaluate high-potential frontier opportunities for Texaco worldwide. Reuter
